devdoc.author: Jurgen Schulte
devdoc.details: Deletion and non approval of request will be implemented in later version

params.approved: A boolean indication if the confirmed transaction is approved

cancelTransaction().details: This function will allow owners to cancel submitted requests by members

confirmTransaction(uint256).details: Allows an owner to confirm a transaction.

constructor.details: Contract constructor sets initial owners of the stokvel account and required number of confirmations.

enroll().details: Checks that the address is not already a member

returns._0: bool Returns a boolean confirming member has been added.

pause().details: This function controls the unpause/pause modifier which is used to prevent withdrawals in case an attack on the contract.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

removeMember().details: This function will allow owners to remove members members

submitRequest(uint256,string).details: The value of the contribution is checked aaginst the minimum contribution stipulated during contract creation

unpause().details: This function controls the unpause/pause modifier which is used to prevent withdrawals in case an attack on the contract.

withdraw(uint256).details: The sender address is checked to ensure it matches that of the initial requestor

devdoc.title: A smart contract for a South African Burial Stokvel

Confirmation(address,uint256,string).notice: Emitted when a submitted request is confirmed

Deposit(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a member deposits his contribution

Execution(uint256).notice: Emitted when a transfer of funds is executed

ExecutionFailure(uint256).notice: Emitted when a transfer of funds fails

LogEnrolled(address).notice: Emitted when a address is enrolled as a member

Submission(uint256).notice: Emitted when a request is submitted

cancelTransaction().notice: Allows approver to cancel submitted transaction

enroll().notice: Enrolls the address as a member

fetchTransaction(uint256).notice: Returns the details of a transaction.

isConfirmed(uint256).notice: Returns the confirmation status of a transaction.

pause().notice: Pause the contract by owners only.

submitRequest(uint256,string).notice: Allows member to submit a payment request

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract by owners only.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws the reqiested amount by the member.

userdoc.notice: The contract allows for multiple owners and members After members pay a contribution they are able to submit requests for payment which need to be approved by owners.
